stories.text: I really enjoy my local library in Texas but the digital library they offer is limited. Do you know of any libraries that have open memberships to non-locals?
stories.title: Ask HN: Any Open Library Memberships?
PowerToys – 11 features Microsoft won’t add to Windows
Engineer gets Windows 11 working on a Surface Duo
Corals convert sunscreen chemical into a toxin that kills them
LTE downlink: reference signals and transmit diversity

stories.text:
Is there anything going on specific to Raspberry Pi or is it just supply chain or chip shortage issues causing the supply and price issues?

I'm seeing prices over $150 when I can find one in the US. It's cheaper to get a refurbished desktop with decent specs. It just takes up more room and uses more electricity. Just wondering when the prices might get closer to normal again.
stories.title: Ask HN: Raspberry Pi Prices and Availability

stories.text:
I'm increasingly seeing people around me give serious thought to this question.
Figuring out what to do in life?
I thought I had figured things out, but now when I think again I feel doubtful. 
So, how do you "figure" things out in a way that it's bulletproof.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you “figure out” what to do in life?
